sentences.chinese: 她儀態萬方地走進屋子。

sentences.english: The external design and stylish interior epitomises presence and luxury.
sentences.chinese: 外部與內部氣派的設計體現了它的儀態與豪華。

sentences.english: 'There's a lack of civility, ' said Mr.
sentences.chinese: 雷貝特先生說，“現在的人們缺少禮貌端莊的儀態。”

sentences.english: Janet carried herself gracefully and attracted all the men present.
sentences.chinese: 詹妮儀態萬方，吸引了在場所有男人的注意。

sentences.english: He preserved his grave and dignified bearing.
sentences.chinese: 他保持莊重威嚴的儀態。

sentences.english: She sailed into the room with-her head held high.
sentences.chinese: 她昂着頭，儀態大方地走進了房間。

sentences.english: The lady sailed into the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 這位女士儀態萬方地走進了飯店。

sentences.english: His behaviour and manners have been refined.
sentences.chinese: 他的行爲和儀態變得很文雅。

sentences.english: The old witch put her worst manners on display.
sentences.chinese: 老巫婆卻露出了她最醜陋的儀態。

sentences.english: If you have the time, go for deportment classes.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有時間，就要去上個儀態班。

sentences.english: The film actress appeared in all her glory at the ball.
sentences.chinese: 這位女影星在舞會上真是儀態萬千。

sentences.english: Beauty is about confidence of bearing.
Samsara's suffering and ultimate consummation is the most beautiful stately.
sentences.chinese: 輪迴的磨難與最終的圓滿是最華美的儀態萬方。

definition: cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
